input.sentences: the shun was shining brightly on this grave .
we looked at a lot of very old graves .
some you could not even read what was on them any longer .
other graves were newer and easily read .
this one had broken and needed to be fixed .
output.sentences: There were so many graves in the yard.
Some were tall, skinny and white
One of the graves next to the pencil shaped one had the name "white" on it.
One of the graves had settled in the grass and was starting to be covered.
